name: Global ruleset
description: These rules must be respected by all the AL code written within the company.

rules.justification: There must be exactly one space character on each side of a binary operator such as := + - AND OR =.
Only use BEGIN..END to enclose compound statements.
Function calls should have parenthesis even if they do not have any parameters.
When BEGIN follows THEN, ELSE, DO, it should be on the same line, preceded by one space character.
Variable declarations should be ordered by type.
An IF followed by two or more ELSE IF should be replaced with a CASE
The name of variables and parameters must be suffixed with the type or object name.
Only temporary variable names must be prefixed with Temp.
TextConst and Label variable names should have an approved suffix.
Lowering permissions should only be used in tests.
Use camel case property values in pages of type API.
Use camel case name for field controls in pages of type API.
Use camel case property values in queries of type API.
Use camel case name for column controls in queries of type API.
A page of type API can only refer to the same subpage once.
The number of parameters passed to a string must match the placeholders.
Do not write code that will never be hit.
Do not declare variables that are unused.
Do not declare parameters by reference if their values are never changed.
Only use AssertError in Test Codeunits.
Only find or get records if you are not using values.
The FindSet() or Find() methods must be used only in connection with the Next() method.
Only use a correct values of ApplicationArea.
Remember to specify either the 'OnAction' trigger or 'RunObject' property on an action.
Do not use identical names for local and global variables.
Use only a correct order for ApplicationArea.
When ApplicationArea is set to 'All', no other values for ApplicationArea should be specified.
When ApplicationArea is set to 'Basic', you must also specify 'Suite'.
To avoid confusion, do not give local variables the same name as fields, methods or actions in the same scope.
To avoid confusion, do not give methods the same name as fields or actions in the same scope.
The value assigned to a variable must be used.
The EventSubscriber method must be local.
Avoid non-indexed fields into filtering. Suboptimal index.
The CalcFields method should only be used with FlowFields or fields of type Blob. The field Cost Amount (Actual) is not a FlowField or of type Blob.
Obsoleted object must have a state 'Pending' or 'Removed' and a justification specifying why this field is being obsoleted.
The local record should be modified before saving to the database.
Follow the style guide about the best practices for naming.
Use a text constant for passing user messages and errors without concatenations.
Use a text constant or label for format string in StrSubstNo.
You must write a tooltip in the Tooltip property for all controls of type Action and Field that exist on page objects.
The value of the Tooltip property of Fields must be filled.
You must specify a OptionCaption property for all fields which source expressions is not a table field.
SIFT index should not be used on primary or unique key.
The value of the OptionCaption property of Fields must be filled in.
The number of option captions specified in the OptionCaption property must match the number of option values available for a variable or a field on a page or report.
You must specify a caption in the Caption property for Fields that exist on page objects.
The value of the Caption property of Fields must be filled in.
The local method must be used, otherwise the variable is not necessary.
StrSubstNo or string concatenation must not be used as a parameter in the Error method.
The FlowField of a table should be indexed.
The 'FindFirst', 'FindLast' and 'Get' methods must be used without the Next() method.
When using 'OnInstallPerCompany' you should also add 'Company - Initialize'::'OnCompanyInitialize' event subscriber.
The name of non-temporary variables must not be prefixed with Temp.
Use all lowercase letters for reserved language keywords.
Limit JIT loads by selecting all fields for load.
You must use the FieldCaption method instead of the FieldName method and TableCaption method instead of TableName method.
Excluding Codecop rules to have few included.
The type or method cannot be used for 'Cloud' development.
The 'with' statement is deprecated.
The 'with' statement is deprecated.
'Caption' is being deprecated in the versions: '1.0' or greater. This property does not have any effect on report columns. This warning will become an error in a future release.
Temporarily disabled for PR 53324.
A procedure belonging to the public API should not be removed.
Event attributes should not be removed.
The type of events should not be changed.
An argument in an event attribute should not be changed to false.
An external scope should not be removed.
A return type should not be modified in external procedures.
Parameters should not be removed or added in external procedures.
Parameters should not be modified, renamed, or removed from events..
The type and subtype of parameters should not be modified in events and external procedures.
Modifying the array size of a parameter in events and external procedures should not be performed.
Reducing the array size of a parameter in events and external procedures is should not be performed.
Pages and PageExtensions that have been published should not be deleted, since dependent extensions may break.
Pages that have been published should not be renamed.
Actions that have been published should not be deleted.
Controls that have been published should not be deleted
The compilation target of an application must be a value that is allowed in a multi-tenant SaaS environment.
Removing a var modifier in events is not allowed.
Interface implementations that have been published must not be deleted.
Interfaces that have been published must not be deleted.
A new method to an interface that has been published must not be added.
Adding an interface to an enum that has been published must have a default implementation.
Changing a table extension's target is not allowed.
Obsolete Reason must be set.
Decreasing the length of a field is not allowed. This might break the upgrade of existing installations and dependent extensions. If the field part of the primary key, the field length cannot change.
It is not allowed to rename an enum value.
It is not allowed to delete a value from an enum.
Fields must not increase in length.
Objects with an ID that can be referenced and which have been published must not be deleted.
Objects that can be referenced and which have been published must not be deleted.
Objects that can be referenced and which have been published must not be renamed.
One or more dependencies of the previous version of the extension could not be found.
A Blob cannot be used as a source expression for a page field.
Actions should use the Image property.
Pages and reports must use the UsageCategory and ApplicationArea properties to be searchable.
The Web client does not support displaying Repeater controls that contain FlowFilter fields!
The Web client does not support displaying Repeater controls in pages of type Card, Document, and ListPlus.
Add PromotedOnly=true to some or all promoted actions to avoid identical actions from appearing in both the promoted and default sections of the command bar.
